title: Create Frequency Dictionary from List
description: In this challenge, you will create a Python function that takes a list as an argument and returns a dictionary with the unique values of the list as keys and their frequencies as the values. This is a common task in data analysis and can be useful in many different applications.

meta.title: Python Function | Value Frequencies | Data Analysis
meta.description: Learn how to create a Python function that takes a list as an argument and returns a dictionary with the unique values of the list as keys and their frequencies as the values.
meta.keywords: Python, function, value frequencies, data analysis, dictionary
